nodes.text: The churis were a species of birds that was native to Endor. The Ewok shaman Logray wore a churi skull atop his head. Logray also had a different churi skull affixed to his hut's roof during the Towani children's search for their parents.
In Caravan of Courage, a flock of squawking birds flies by the Warrick family hut. These may have been churis.
